item.title: CAMPBELL SOUP CO 10-K
item.description: CAMPBELL SOUP CO, which is in the Food & Kindred Products [2000] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 22, 2022 had 28895 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: million - 363 instances 2022 - 331 instances 1 - 299 instances 2021 - 297 instances financial - 206 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
